snippet: MOORE--Alan. The Board and staff of The Anne Frank Center are deeply saddened by the loss of Alan Moore, trusted colleague, dear friend, and the Center's CFO. Alan joined the Center in 2007 and firmly believed our work contributes to making the world a better place. He was a committed Freemason, a professional organist, and a devoted uncle. His loss is hard to bear. Our thoughts are with Alan's family and friends at this difficult time. 1/3
